topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Step 4 - Deploying the Standard Region (Denver Topology)

body.p: After the lifecycle manager is installed, the next task in installing the Denver topology is to deploy the HP Helion OpenStack cloud.

If you are installing the denver template, which includes the KVM Region and uses AVS networking, follow these instructions. You can use the HCG Dashboard UI or the lifecycle manager CLI to deploy the Standard Region.
